Posts.Content: Hi all through my chemo which stopped bout 8weeks ago ,and up to date ( hair growth showing a little ) I have used Liz Earle shampoo . Just a tiny drop and then after drying my head I rub in some dry skin oil from the Jennifer Young Beauty Despite Cancer  site. Which tho not cheap seems to nourish it. The site has some excellent products and you can read about and ask questions on . They are very helpful . Hope you find something that works for you.  Good luck xx
Posts.Title: Dry, flaky, itch scalp since chemo.

Posts.Content: Hi ladies sorry you have return of the alien BC.  I had lumpectomy in 2013 but got return of it 2016 in form of fluid in the lung ( nasty thing ) but made my mind up to live with cancer not let it spoil my days. Have finished IV FEC but need to have chemo tablet form . The thing I remember the nurse telling me was always try to be positive but most of all allow yourself to have s bad day too . Cry , eat too much . and scream and stamp if it's needed ( not in the shops though. ) Big hug to all x
